Design

To me, design is about making the way people experience life better, more equitable, more sustainable, more fun, more exciting, more informative. Over the years, I‚Äôve engaged in various types of design, most of them related to digital environments.

For the past eight years, I‚Äôve specialized in designing Tools for people at work. Managing and conducting [[ User research ]] is my favorite part of my job.

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they), a researcher, designer, queer facilitator, and IndieWeb advocate from Amsterdam. If you found anything on this website of value and want to say thank you, you can support me via Ko-Fi or PayPal.
